name: Spike Key Demo
description:
Spike Key is a simple precision platformer with puzzle and resource management elements.  The gameplay revolves around figuring out how to get to the goal while only using limited movements and surpassing challenging and precise platforming. The game consists of 30 stages, and 4 different characters to play. 

The goal of the game is to get to the portal to progress to the next level.

You only have a limited amount of movements per stage, so watch how many you have left closely.

Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow-Keys to move.
  • Space bar for "Special Action".
  • No gamepad support.
  • You may skip a Level with "Enter" or go back to a previous level with "Backspace".
Suggestions:
  • Play the downloadable Windows version if possible for the best experience.
  • If you don't seem to enjoy normal mode due to the resource management aspect of it, try "Free Mode"
  • If you are having trouble with a Level but want to see what's ahead, don't hesitate on skipping that Level., you can always go back to it later.
Known issues: 
  • The browser version has some audio, graphical an performance issues
  • Due to a browser specific bug the final 3 levels have been set to "free mode (unlimited actions"
Feel free to leave any and all thoughts or recommendations in the comments below, hope you enjoy the game and have fun! :D
